From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Plintissa and Dracona were struck down with missiles and looked up in
annoyance. Plintissa was hit worse as usual and was getting mighty angry.
All of the "Random attacks" were directed toward Suukie, who was doing most
of the damage. Suukie was knocked back and forth and he shot at the ion
Disks, knocking one away but the other one of the Ion Disks met his mid
section and with a quick slice, and mech fluid leaked all over the battle
field as Suukie dropped like a rock. The Radicons were also hit with some
lasers, and were getting annoyed. Plintissa, Dracona, and the Radicons
walked over and grabbed Suukie.

"Let's go!" Plintissa ordered. Suukie squirmed away and stood up looking
very insane.

"I'm not leaving until the Maximals win and the Preds are crushed!" Suukie
said, his blood still dripping fast, he didn't make a rhyme. Plintissa
growled and grabbed him.

"I'm not going to see you die! Your coming with me!" Plintisssa said,
dragging Suukie.

"No, I must do this, I love you." Suukie said back to her without rhymes.
Plintissa understood.

"Yeah, I know, I love you too, that's why I'm taking you back!" Plintissa
said. Suukie pulled away.

"If you love me let me destroy the enemies of the Maximals, I promise I'll
never leave you." Suukie said, sounding very serious. Sinesis and Sinister
jump Suukie within a second, and he fought with them both. Plintissa tried
to help but Suukie threw her back with one hand. Plintissa understood and
the People's Group stepped baack into hiding. Suukie brawled with them both,
but they quickly overtook him and pounded on him with clubs...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 12, 2000 10:30 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Yes, Code, my fault.  Now that you mention that, it's unfair.  I could
keep

turned

though

have
> to ask Hell Beast or Yanshosh)
>
> Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee:
>
> Double Punch cursed.  "48% of the autoguns down?  Hmmm...," he said,
looking
> at a screen as he saw the shields slip to 75%, "those two are attacking
the
> Maximals." referring to Sinister and Sinesis.
>

>
> Injector fired two more stinger missiles off at the attacking People's
Group
> members, randomly.
>
> -----
>

> randomly at the attacing People's Group.
>

>
> Bumblebee chuckled, raising both of his stinger missile launchers, firing
off
> two stinger missiles at Plintissa, two from the other launcher at Dracona,
> and two optic blasts at a random member of the attackers of the Pred base.
